Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.cards

Class PlayCard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.cards.Card
it.polimi.ingsw.model.cards.PlaceableCard
it.polimi.ingsw.model.cards.PlayCard
Direct Known Subclasses:
GoldCard, ResourceCard
public abstract class PlayCard extends PlaceableCard
This class represents a card that can be played.

A play card (short for playable) is a card that is actively played through the main stage of the game. All of the cards that can be held in the hand and then played during a player's turn must be play cards.

By default when instantiated a card is facing downwards (displaying back)

  • Constructor Details

    • PlayCard

      protected PlayCard()
      Default constructor: builds a "blank" card with all corners empty on both sides. Also doesn't initialize the resource and sets the points on placement to zero.

    • PlayCard

      protected PlayCard(String cardID, GameResource backResource, Corner... corners) throws InvalidParameterException
      Constructs a card with the given identifier, specified resource on the back and given corners.
      Parameters:
      cardID - card identifier
      backResource - resource displayed on the back
      corners - corners contained in the card
      Throws:
      InvalidParameterException - when a duplicate corner is found

    • PlayCard

      corners - the corners associated with the card

    • PlayCard

      protected PlayCard(String cardID, GameResource backResource, int pointsOnPlace, Corner... corners) throws InvalidParameterException
      This constructor creates a card with placement points.
      Parameters:
      cardID - card identifier
      backResource - the resource displayed on the back of the card
      pointsOnPlace - the points multiplier on card placing
      corners - the corners associated with the card
      Throws:
      InvalidParameterException - when a duplicate corner is found

    • PlayCard

      protected PlayCard(String cardID, GameResource backResource, int pointsOnPlace, List<Corner> corners) throws InvalidParameterException
      Constructs a playable card with the given identifier, specified resource on the back, value of placement and list of corners.
      Parameters:
      cardID - card identifier
      backResource - resource displayed on the back
      pointsOnPlace - score obtained at placement
      corners - list of corners contained in the card
      Throws:
      InvalidParameterException - when a duplicate corner is found

    • PlayCard

      protected PlayCard(GamePoint placement, PlayCard oldCard)
      This constructor builds the card when positioned.

      It adds the information of the position.
      This constructor exists in order to build immutable card objects.

      Parameters:
      placement - coordinates at which it is placed
      oldCard - copied card

  • Method Details

    • getCardResources

      public Map<GameResource,Integer> getCardResources()
      Returns a map containing the number of visible resources on the card.
      These are either visible corner resources or card's back resource.
      Specified by:
      getCardResources in class PlaceableCard
      Returns:
      a map with the count of the card's visible resources

    • compareCard

      protected boolean compareCard(PlaceableCard other)
      This method compares two playable card objects.

      Returns true if the two cards have the same properties:
      - Orientation;
      - Corners;
      - Back resource and colour;
      - Placement points;
      - Placement cost.
      Returns false otherwise.

      Overrides:
      compareCard in class PlaceableCard
      Parameters:
      other - the card with which to compare
      Returns:
      true if the card is the same as the argument; false otherwise
